subject: Re: Bugzilla
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Henrik Zagerholm wrote:
> Hello,
> 
> When is bugzilla planed to go online?
> Its been "temporarily" offline a while now. :)

hardware issues.  Still working on it.  The main
problem has been getting fast turnaround between
myself and the hosting provider.  Will hopefully
be resolved today.  And we are working on setting
up a mirrored server so that we can easily swap
should something like this occur again.





cheers,jerry

Centeris                         -----------  http://www.centeris.com
